page.title: 08CHURCHES (CONTINUED)
page.content: {KINGDOM HALL}is the place of worship of the{Jehovah's Witnesses}and is situated in Olympic Way. It was built in 1979 and is 'L' shaped. In other churches there are priests, but Witnesses have elders. To become an elder you must be male and at least 30 years old. It is also necessary to have a thorough knowledge of the Bible and the practical problems of everyday life like marriage and financial matters. Before becoming an elder, one is appointed as a ministerial servant, a helper of the elders. In Wellingborough there are about 9 elders and 13 ministerial servants.
